items.q: Can I change the plan at any time?
items.a: Yes, you can upgrade or downgrade your plan anytime to match your career needs.

items.q: Is there a setup fee?
items.a: No, there is no setup fee.

items.q: Do you offer support during the free trial?
items.a: Yes, our support is available during the trial as well.

items.q: How does revenue sharing from ads work in the basic plan?
items.a: You pay a percentage of revenue on successful hires.

items.q: Which payment methods do you accept?
items.a: We accept credit card, SEPA direct debit and PayPal.

specialties.title: Our Services
specialties.desc: Higherd is your one-stop shop for international recruitment of STEM candidates. Our local recruiters thoroughly check candidates' backgrounds. In addition, our value-based AI technology ensures cultural fit with your company and local team. At Higherd, you get a genuine candidate background, higher employee retention rates, and dedicated support to optimize all international procedures.

items.title: Expert Recruiting
items.desc: Our dedicated recruiters are here to match your clients with the perfect candidates, ensuring cultural and professional fit. By accessing a vast pool of exceptional STEM talent, we help you fill positions faster, enabling you to meet your clients' needs with confidence.

items.title: Visa Support
items.desc: Bureaucratic hurdles are major challenges in cross-border hiring. We ensure a stress-free relocation experience for you and your employees. We take care of everything!

items.title: Onboarding and Integration
items.desc: How can we ensure higher employee retention rates? Our comprehensive learning and development program focuses on organizing certified courses, on-the-job training, and access to government funding programs to ensure stronger ties to your company and mission.

items.title: Human Resources
items.desc: A wide range of candidates from various industries to help you build strong and diverse teams

faqs.q: How do I apply for a student job?
faqs.a: Simply create a profile and apply directly to interesting positions.

faqs.q: Can I get help with my resume?
faqs.a: Yes, our team offers optimization and review of your resume.
Most internships are paid, details can be found in the respective listing.

faqs.q: Is there support for international students?
faqs.a: Of course! We offer visa, language and relocation support.

about.title: About Higherd
about.teamDesc: At Higherd, you get genuine candidate backgrounds, higher employee retention rates, and dedicated support to optimize all international procedures.
about.subtitle: Our mission is to make recruiting human and effective.

hero.title: Frankfurt made HR-Tech
hero.subtitle: Higherd Solutions is an HR-tech startup based in Frankfurt. The company was founded by Vitena Xhori, who started with traditional recruiting of civil engineers abroad and outsourcing services for German companies. As the company grew, we discovered more talented candidates from other STEM fields who not only have the required qualifications but also bring a vibrant spectrum of solution-oriented perspectives to the challenges of German industry.

specialties.title: What sets us apart
specialties.desc: We offer a fully automated hiring journey, including VISA and relocation procedures, onboarding and upskilling. Transparency is our highest value, ensuring verified qualifications through real experts. Our innovative 'Reverse Employment' feature allows companies to access top talent faster. The unique value-based matching algorithm guarantees perfect alignment between candidate skills and expectations and company global values and local culture.

items.title: Construction
items.desc: The Higherd founder's background as a German civil engineer ensures deep understanding of market needs. Our candidates have deep understanding from project start to completion and are familiar with cutting-edge technologies like Building Information Modeling (BIM) and digitalization.
